text: cng reiyk khea hela nan tam (chux) phx khxng phwk khea man penkar theiyngthrrm kwa n thi xallxhˌ hak phwk cea miru cak phx (cring «) khxng phwk khea dangnan phwk khea k khux phinxng rwm nı sasna khxng phwk cea læa phu kıl chid khxng phwk cea læa mi pen thi na tahni kæ phwk cea nı sing thi phwk cea phid phlad nı reuxng nan tæ sing thi citcı khxng phwk cea mi khwam munghmay tanghak læa xallxhˌ pen phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx
